name: Sonic Twist
description:
Let's the beats flow through your mind like a twist.
It is the image of sound waving around you.
SONIC TWIST could bring to you a new music experience in-game with the 3D visual design and high-quality trending songs. If you are a music lover, you can not miss this
Install and play for free now.
MAIN FEATURE:
- Huge song listing
- 3D Design.
- Challenge yourself with a hundred of level
- Unlock new free music contents
HOW TO PLAY:
- Hold and drag a finger to move a ball.
- Hit the sonic wave to gain a score.
- Try not to fall out or miss the wave.
- Collect gems to unlock more new content.
LET’S TRY IT OUT AND YOU WILL NOT REGRET
